Title: When You Give Bakar a Bone
Description:
I had some of the most beautiful bonewrought bows, but our bakar got to them before they could be put to use. Bakar love to chew bones, whether bow or not, and now they are ruined!

Can you aid me in crafting replacements?
ObjectivesText: Craft 2 Bonewrought Crossbows for Hideshaper Koruz in Valdrakken.
